title: Comparison of DNA Extraction Teaching Methods: Video Game-Based Learning vs. Traditional Laboratory Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Knowledge in Life Sciences and Understanding of DNA Structure
context.additional_context: Comparative analysis of game-based learning and laboratory simulations using mobile devices in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of DNA extraction processes and compare conceptual differences between two educational methods
Learners can complete DNA extraction simulations in a video game-based learning environment with over 80% accuracy
Learners can write reports analyzing the strengths and weaknesses of two educational methods through project-based learning
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
